coding_practice.title: Sort Array By Parity II
coding_practice.description:
Given an array of integers nums, half of the integers in nums are odd, and the other half are even.

Sort the array so that whenever nums[i] is odd, i is odd, and whenever nums[i] is even, i is even.

Return any answer array that satisfies this condition.
coding_practice.constraints:
2 <= nums.length <= 2 * 10^4
nums.length is even.
Half of the integers in nums are even.
0 <= nums[i] <= 1000
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 初始化結果列表 res，長度與 A 相同。
2. 用 even_index 和 odd_index 追蹤下一個偶數和奇數應放的位置。
3. 遍歷 A，如果數字是偶數，放到 res[even_index] 並 even_index +2；如果是奇數，放到 res[odd_index] 並 odd_index +2。
4. 返回 res，即符合奇偶索引排序的結果。
